page_content:
Layer 2
•Input: output of layer 1 with volume 98 x 98 x 200
◦ K = 100
◦ F = 3
◦ P = 0
◦ S = 1
•O = (W−F+2P)/S+1 = (98 –3 + 0)/1 + 1= 96
•Output volume size = 96 x 96 x 100
•No. of parameter = F⋅F⋅D1 = 3 x 3 x 200 = 1800 for each filter
•Total No. of Parameter = (F⋅F⋅D1)⋅K + K  = 1800 X 100 + 100 = 180,100
